list season complet arizona cardinals. cardin american footbal franchis compet member west divis nation footbal confer (nfc) nation footbal leagu (nfl). list document season-by-season record cardinals' franchis 1920 present, includ postseason records, leagu award individu player head coaches. legend[edit] (#) order leagu championship franchis finish final posit league, division, confer offens player year award dpoy nation footbal leagu defens player year award oroy nation footbal leagu offens rooki year award droy nation footbal leagu defens rooki year award wp moy walter payton man year award nfl champion (1920–1969) super bowl champion (1970–present) confer champion divis champion wild card berth qualifi playoff season records[edit] season team leagu confer divis regular season
